documents.document: My mother told me that my outfit was "bang on trend" today, apparently she's picking up slang from Xposé
@JonoRyle I'm a bitch but he deserved it
@BarryFishinRyan it's called a backpack, it just didn't go with my outfit today
Have a bit of sympathy for the female designers of the world carting around a laptop, two sketch books and a DSLR in their handbags
The puns are on point https://t.co/TGlLfpESc3
So he tries to get me to dance (this is his third time annoying me) so I stood up, I was in boots so about 6'3", and I patted his head
These two lads in the roost kept annoying me and Monika and one of them was super short, like 5'6"
Here lads I'm actually going to hell
Monika just took a break from her rant about rugby to tell me I look gorgeous, are we going out? Feels like a relationship to me
Real question though: is Gimme! Gimme! Gimme! A man after midnight a song about a bootycall?
@JonoRyle no they were still ripped
The one day I come to work looking super professional and I'm on my own...
Lovely Woman in Tech ticket booked for @WebSummit 2017! Roll on November and Lisbon! <3
Having a sketchbook with you at all times to sketch whenever you have an idea is great until you end up sketching on a very bumpy bus
Keeping my passport away from these lads anyway... https://t.co/J56xvlg4az via @lovindotie
This ad may be for a sporting brand but praising creativity makes me love it even more! <3 https://t.co/fTfzmID9GT
I got to design an Art Deco style poster this evening and honestly I am in my element, forgot how much I loved that era!
I'm such a failure of a student, my friends are going out yet I'm sitting at home in my jammies watching Corrie
@Dervlynch you're back on twitter!! 💛💛💛
Girls talking about being chatty with taxi drivers while drunk, I had two drinks and now I'm following my taxi driver on Instagram 💁🏼
Why do petite women have an entire wall of top shop but tall gals only have a rack? It ain't easy being a giant
Lads stall the digger... Taylor Swift was drinking Jameson with with Zayn... JAMESON, MY DRINK!!
Forgot my glasses and I have 8 more hours of looking at a blurry screen in work, pray for me
Can someone please just pay me to travel the world and take pictures? I own a camera and take hipster angled shots… https://t.co/xdv81cOTPP
Will someone please come play basketball with me tomorrow, it's been too long and I miss it
@ciaragilmartin haha sorry gal I already gave them to my Mam! 🙈
I don't know what makes me happier the fact the captain on this flight is a lady or that there's an emoji for her 👩🏻‍✈️equality for the win!
AerLingus are playing @Kodaline as you get on the plane in Charles de Gaulle, feels like home already! 💛
Airport shopping is so weird, I just bought nearly a kilo of peanut M&Ms, I don't even like M&Ms
Oh Paris how I adore you and your architecture! 💛📷 https://t.co/vyTVNjsESA
I am the tallest by about half a foot, I think they're trying to figure out where the giant Caucasian came from
I have accidentally become part of a large Chinese tour group or family, they all seem to know each other
@IDylanOBrienI @erbekah The pictures are making me remember stuff
Lil drunk candid of @erbekah in our amazing bedroom in coppers the other night https://t.co/VhxN2QThpT
@IDylanOBrienI @erbekah you're actually the cutest! 💛
@IDylanOBrienI @erbekah I have no idea! 😂 think it was the first time we went up to the room cause I slightly remember it
@IDylanOBrienI @erbekah I kinda want to scare you and say you took it off me first but it was laying on my bed!😂
The future of product design is safe with these two (and my bra, supporting one product designer in all the right p… https://t.co/7rPx2za6vv
@erbekah @IDylanOBrienI I have more where you can actually see that the two of you are wearing my bra 👙
Look at these two cuties! 💛 https://t.co/jhXjEjYfPj
Packing is not going well, someone please help me
It's 5am, I can't sleep because of a splitting headache that won't go away and I have to wake up to study in 3 hour… https://t.co/EvjsakS4fq
Please raise your hand if you have been personally victimised by design for manufacturing 🙋🏼 https://t.co/XMAR1R3UvR
Lads we have been stressing about an exam that is 70% of a 5 credit module, it is worth 5.8% of our degree... 5.8%.… https://t.co/kDl0AynJdT
Someone found my leap card and handed it into the library which means that they seem the horrific potato head photo of me! 🙈
Feeling a bit circle of life studying here at night using the laptop I worked nights here to save for, maybe that's why I'm being productive
I don't know why I'm finding it so odd that I'm productive while studying in McDonalds considering I worked here for 3 and a half years
Can someone please rap the steps of design for manufacturing so I may learn it as well as I unfortunately know side to side by Ariana grande
Lads if this exam goes badly I'm going to Euro Disney next week to pretend to be a child and cry on the teacups
@AoifNolan she's so formal, surprised she didn't sign off regards, Mam! 😂
So today I went to get some but once again there was none but I am strong now so I got a toffeecrisp and accepted the fact that imma fail
And I needed some so badly that Beka had to walk to Tesco with me so I could buy some cause it was like 11pm
Around this time two years ago I had a legit mental breakdown in the library cause they didn't have fruit pastilles
Apparently girls want a guy that emails them when they block them, my Mam emails me when I miss her calls and texts https://t.co/9kB2xVsnpV
Never been to Oxford but I'm a fan of their commas
@erbekah did ya notice I went on a bit of a creep there yeah? Report/studying ain't going well
@erbekah yeah I'm definitely doing the formatting, I don't trust you not to use comic sans 'ironically'
@erbekah this is...
This time next week I will be in Paris and that is the only thing getting me through this torturous day in the library
This exam will actually be the death of me, I’m three slides in and already hating life
Watching the rude customer snaps in @JamesKavanagh_'s story gave me flashbacks to my McDonalds years, btw the customer is NEVER right! 🙈
Quote of the day today: sorry I just have to let you know, you're missing half an eyebrow
Lads I don't know if you're aware of this but there's a website out there selling my secrets! 😳
Nap all day and complain about not being able to sleep all night
@erbekah yeah let's say it was to cheer you up and not deciding what I should buy...
@erbekah we measured you and you're not 6ft! I am 180cm which makes me 5'11"
@erbekah it's the truth though! You're not 6 foot and neither am I!
@erbekah I'm 5'11" and a half at most
So I taught my sister how to use Instagram and now she goes on and likes my work accounts posts but not mine... ungrateful and shady
Lads hold everything... there is now a whiskey emoji! 🥃 finally!!
They sell 7 inch heels??? I would be 6'6"!! 😳
Another life goal, to pull off a pony tail like Serena Van der Woodsen, or well pull off anything like S
My only diet tip is to add a horrific amount of cayenne pepper, paprika, and chilli flakes to every meal so it's so spicy you can't eat it
My dream in life is to have a herb garden so I can always have fresh herbs when I'm cooking - I'm 22, how is that my dream?
I wanted breakfast but I’m slightly on autopilot so I ended up back at my desk with coffee and no food
@erbekah parcel motel gal, you can get it delivered to the north and then they bring it down to you!
I'm back to work in the morning and the past two weeks have ruined the sleeping pattern I spent a year creating, loving life
I want to wear a dress and boots to work tomorrow but it's cold outside!
My pinterest home page is the perfect mix of design, portfolios, clothes, and make up and it just makes me so happy
When beka sees me taking screenshots of her exam notes snapchats and texts me asking if I want her notes, she da real MVP! 💛
@erbekah it was hilar! 😂😂 he also sent some selfies!
My sister joined instagram the other day so I wrote her bio and taught her how to use it! https://t.co/jDpeGdb4kl
First tweet of 2017 is definitely one to be proud of
Miranda Hart is the woman I strive to be
I know I've watched the entire series before but Dan and Blair together makes me gag
Also two years ago this year night I got black out drunk drinking straight vodka while severely jet lagged at @erbekah's 21st! Ah memories
Never forget that I once put my phone into one of the knee holes in my jeans and thought I left it in a taxi
I DRAGGED @erbekah today for her birthday, V proud of those captions but I may have to emigrate to somewhere withou… https://t.co/GegjbRU9Hc
The best type of emails, Airbnb, flight, and shipping confirmations https://t.co/B7nKpghiQp
Shopping with Monika - quote of the day so far has to be I'm not going to Morocco with you to bail you out of jail when you get arrested
Someone needs to tell me that my legs don't look like tree trunks in my new over knee boots because this is how I'm… https://t.co/z9b8l5dHEC
@AdeleBiddulph come home, Maynooth (me) misses you
Yesterday I thought that learning crazy little thing called love was gonna be impossible, today I'm just mixing up two riffs - being Bassic
Not rich enough to be a sugar mamma unfortunately
Seeing guys on bumble with whatever college and graduation year 2020 and feeling hella old! Cradle robber or cougar?
@AoifNolan gal I don't know if I'm becoming a grown up or if I lost my last shit to give but it's working for me 🙃
I keep being targeted with ads from Product Design in UL and I'm very jealous, their workshop looks so much better than ours
Adulthood is spilling hot chocolate all over your stomach and simply zipping up your hoody and pretending nothing happened
You know you're getting old when you do the lotto and think if I win I'll buy new glasses and get health insurance
Just realised that I forgot to turn on my out of office and turn off my alarms, not like the alarms wake me or anyone emails me
